101625.召喚士の指輪は 光に包まれて消えた！:
The Summoner's Ring vanishes in a flash of
light!

101626.「私は……ずっと……\n ずっとずっと…… つらかったんだ……。:
I... I have...
always...always been in pain...

101627.「お前は 本当に いい奴だから…… \n 私は 私自身の みにくい 妬みの感情を:
You really are a great person...
I had to hold back my ugly jealousy
I held towards you...

101628.「わ 私は……グガ…… もう限界だった……\n オマエの才能の前で わ 私のドリ:
I...urgh...I hit my limit...
In the face of your talent, my...my efforts...
Ggh...it was meaningless...

101629.「コッ コノ 宝珠と…… ワタシの召喚術デ…… \n はジメて 超えられると思ッ:
W...with the jewel...and my summoning...
I thought I could finally surpass you!!
This misery... I could finally...

101630.「オマエニ……グゲッ ソバニイル ニンゲンノ\n イタミガ ワカル ハズガ ナイ:
You...YOU CAN'T POSSIBLY UNDERSTAND THE PAIN
OF THOSE AROUND YOU...!!
I...I WILL...SURPASS YOU!!!!!! GAHHH!!!!

101632.「オマエ……グゲッ マダイル……\n コンド…コソ……ゴポッ オマ コエ……\n:
YOU...ARE STILL HERE...
THIS TIME, I WILL...SURPASS...!
GRAAAAAAH!!!

101634.「ハァ……ハァ……\n 邪法に手を染めても……ついに\n お前を 超えることは:
Huff... Huff...
Resorting to forbidden magic...even that
was not enough to surpass you...

101635.「私は お前に友情を感じる反面 その才能を\n 心底うらやんでいた……その 怪物:
On one hand, I felt our friendship...but on the other hand, I deeply envied your talent... I could not suppress those monstrous feelings
inside of me...

101636.「私のしたことが 許されるとは思っていない。 \n だが これでもう 罪を重ねな:
I don't expect you to forgive me for what I've done. But, now...I will no longer have to repeat the sins I've committed...right?
Thank y...

101639.……中央塔の最上層で 見たものは\n今までにないくらい 凶悪な魔人と融合して\n:
...What I saw on the tower's top floor was
a monstrous Linjahar, fused with an
unbelievably vicious fiend.

101640.これ以上 被害を出させないために\n俺は アイツもろとも この時空の狭間に\n転:
To prevent any further chaos, I had no choice
but to send the both of us to this rift in
spacetime.

101641.アイツは 俺やエテーネへの憎悪をさけびながら\n襲いかかってきた。戦いは何日も続:
He lunged at me, screaming of his hatred of both me and Ethene. The battle went on for days as we each pushed the other to their very
limit.

101642.思えばこれが 初めてのケンカだったな。\nいつ倒されても おかしくない状況だった:
Come to think of it...this was the first fight we ever had. Either one of us could've fallen at a moment's notice, but, strangely...it was
enjoyable...

101643.最後には アイツも どこか清々しい表情で\n君と 全力で戦うことができて よかっ:
In the end, he had somewhat refreshed look on his face, and said "I'm glad I could fight you with my all."
Then, he passed...as if falling into a deep sleep.

101644.俺は もう 全てのチカラを使い果たして\nここから戻ることは できそうにないが…:
I've used all my strength, so I'm not sure if
I'll ever be able to return...but if I was able to
save his soul, then I'm happy.

101645.ただ ひとつだけ 心残りなのは……\nお前の成長を 見守れないことだ。:
My only regret is that I won't be able to
watch you grow up.

101646.だから せめて この想いを\n結晶に込めて 送ろうと思う。:
So I'm going to at least put this thought into
crystals and send them to you.

102945.我が子 <pc>よ……\nこの世界を愛し 強く生きろ。\nお前が よき友に 出会:
My child <pc>... love this world and
live strong. I hope you find a good friend.
